hero.title: Collaborating with HelpLab
hero.subtitle: An open source platform to design, support and measure social and environmental impact initiatives.

intro.paragraph1: HelpLab is an open infrastructure that connects people, organizations, companies and public bodies through concrete local challenges.
intro.paragraph2: Collaboration models are flexible and adapt to organizational goals, without rigid packages or predefined constraints.

modes.title: Ways to collaborate
modes.subtitle: Some options available today and evolving in future releases.
